Hello?
Hi, Amanda.
How are you?
I'm tired and sleepy.
I'm still in the office.
Really?
Go home!
I want to, but I can't!
Why not?
I have some paperwork to do tonight.
What a pity!
Can we have our lesson today?
Yes.
I need a break anyway.
Okay, then.
What are you going to do after your work?
I'm so tired, so I will just go home.
Do you always go straight home?
Not really.
Sometimes, I hang out with my friends.
What do you usually do with your friends?
We go for dinner or a drink.
Yesterday, I shot some pool with some of my friends.
That sounds fun.
Well, what are you going to do when you get back home?
I'm going to clean my room and do the laundry.
After that, I'll iron some clothes.
Hey, didn't you say you were tired and sleepy?
Yeah, but it's my daily routine.
I need to finish it today.
